mapper.select: SELECT BASE_CONFIG_IDX as IDX ,GUBN ,CONFIG_CODE ,CONFIG_VALUE ,CONFIG_SUMMARY ,CONFIG_STATUS ,u.USER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(b.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as REG_DATE ,TO_CHAR(b.UP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as MODIFI_DATE FROM SC_BASE_CONFIG b LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_USER_INFO u ON b.REG_DW_USER_IDX = u.USER_IDX ORDER BY b.BASE_CONFIG_IDX asc

select BASE_CONFIG_IDX as IDX ,GUBN ,CONFIG_CODE ,CONFIG_VALUE ,CONFIG_SUMMARY ,CONFIG_STATUS ,u.USER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(b.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as REG_DATE ,TO_CHAR(b.UP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as MODIFI_DATE FROM SC_BASE_CONFIG b LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_USER_INFO u ON b.REG_DW_USER_IDX = u.USER_IDX WHERE 1=1
and GUBN = #{gubun}
and CONFIG_CODE like '%' || #{textval} || '%'
and CONFIG_VALUE like '%' || #{textval} || '%'

select BASE_CONFIG_IDX as IDX ,GUBN ,CONFIG_CODE ,CONFIG_VALUE ,CONFIG_SUMMARY ,CONFIG_STATUS ,CONFIG_OPTION ,CONFIG_OPTION2 ,CONFIG_OPTION3 ,b.REG_DATE,u.USER_ID FROM SC_BASE_CONFIG b LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_USER_INFO u ON b.REG_DW_USER_IDX = u.USER_IDX where BASE_CONFIG_IDX = #{idx}
